Tim

Posted By: steve yawitz

Posted By: Steve Dawson

Chase - Throwing/White Cap

Kleinow - Batting

Knight - Batting

LaPorte

Steve

Posted By: Tim Caravella
Thanks for the help!!!!  Great info.

Tim

Posted By: Jim VB
<<Thanks for the help!!!! Great info.>>

Aaaah come on Tim. Don't be so easy on them. It took these slackers 9 and 13 minutes to get around to answering your question. 


(This board is simply amazing, isn't it?)

Posted By: Tim Caravella
As someone fairly new to the vintage market I must say I constantly read the boards here and gain an incredible amount of knowledge.  This is by far one of the best boards I have seen.

Now, that being said, if someone would cough up a nicely graded T200 NY Americans we would really be rolling!!!

Tim
